definitions.text: a document ordering the payment of money; drawn by one person or bank on another
a current of air (usually coming into a chimney or room or vehicle)
a preliminary sketch of a design or picture
a serving of drink (usually alcoholic) drawn from a keg
any of the various versions in the development of a written work
examples: the final draft of the constitution

definitions.text: the depth of a vessel's keel below the surface (especially when loaded)
a regulator for controlling the flow of air in a fireplace

examples: he finished it at a single gulp

definitions.text: the act of moving a load by drawing or pulling
draw up an outline or sketch for something
engage somebody to enter the army
